description: Baking fish in foil is a simple way to ensure it is perfectly steamed with gentle lemon and fennel flavour.
name: Lemon & Fennel Bake in The Bag Trout Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium onion, peeled and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Cut 4 large rectangles of foil and parchment paper and place the parchment on the foil.

Place sliced onions, fennel and lemon on each rectangle of parchment, top with trout fillets, capers, dill, a drizzle of olive oil and lemon juice. Wrap up to form sealed parcels with a bit of room inside for steam.
Place the parcels on baking trays and bake for 12-14 minutes. Serve the parcels on plates to open at the table.
